reviewText: Over thirty years ago when I produced and shot this film, it was a very different time. When it was released, people loved it. But like anything from 30 years ago, it's now very dated. I have no idea how the cover ended up looking like it does. When the film was completed, the cover was the same as the book by the same name. I guess our international distributor didn't think it was "sexy" enough, so now there's a cover image that has absolutely nothing to do with the movie. Oh well, that's show biz!
